channel.title: Awesomeness on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Awesomeness on Butterfly Dream

item.title: The Lego Movie
item.description: With a 96% critics rating and a 92% audience rating, you know this movie has done something right. It is a family movie, so go in obviously expecting that. But given that, I enjoyed it more than I ever imagined. The little details, the references. The way the references were handled, even the overall main and underlying stories; typical as they were, were pretty good. Not all entertainment needs to be vulgar to make it big.
